mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ID) OVER() AS MAX_COUNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PT.ID DESC) AS ROWNUM, PT.ID, PT.TITLE, PT.CONTENT, PT.WRITER, PT.VIEW_CNT, PT.NOTICE_YN, PT.DELETE_YN, PT.CREATE_DATE, PT.MODIFIED_DATE, PT.POST_TYPE, FT.TRANS_FILE_PATH AS FILE_LIST FROM POST_TABLE PT LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE_TABLE FT ON FT.FILE_REFER_KEY = PT.ID WHERE PT.ID = #{keyId}
mapper.update: UPDATE POST_TABLE SET TITLE = #{postTitle}, CONTENT = #{postContent}, POST_TYPE = #{postType}, MODIFIED_DATE = NOW() WHERE ID = #{id}
